src_text: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.

[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

src_text: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.

hyp_text: He race hnuhnung ber a nihna, Giant Slalom a ni a, a awmna hmun khuaite kha women's sitting group-ah ten naupang chuan 4:41.30 hmaa an tihchhuah a, a hnuah Austrian Claudia Loesch chuan a hnuaihawmna a ni a, a tihchhuah hmaa 2:11.60 hma an tihchhuah a ni a, Hungary-ah Gyöngyi Dani chuan a hnuaihawmna a ni a, a tihchhuah hmaa 1:09.02 hma an tihchhuah a ni.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.

src_text: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
ref_text: Sakeibaknei chhungkua hi a ruala cheng ho thin, ui leh chinghniate nen inanna an nei a, an sapelhnaah an hlauhawm hle bawk.
hyp_text: Lion pride te hi wolf leh dog te pawh a ni lo a, pawisa kan tawp a nih avangin lion te pawh an hrethiam a, an hrethiam hmasa ber pawh an ni lo a, an prey te hi a tawp tawk a ni.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: Subsistence agriculture chu a hautak lova, damdawi tel lova thlai chin thîn a ni bawk a, chumi atân chuan thlai chi an lo khawl sa sa an hmang mai thîn emaw tlema hlawk deuh turin awlai angreng takin a hmun chu zauh a ni mai thîn bawk.
hyp_text: Subsistence agriculture hi thil pawimawh hminga hman tih chuan chhungkaw chhunga thil pawimawh an tih chuan a hman thin a ni. Hei hian ecoregion chhunga thil thar an ngaih a, crop rotation leh thil anihna tihna an hmang hian an tih chuan, an hmaichhia tihna a ni.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

src_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
ref_text: Tibetan meditation lairîl ber chu Deity Yoga a ni. Pathian hrang hrang mitthlana atang chuan chakna lakna hnar te chu tihfai an ni a, chakra (chakna lo chhuahna) chu tih nun a ni a, tichuan thlarau lama finna pek an ni thin a ni.
hyp_text: Chhutpui leh a hmasawnna thil tih ngaihthlakna chanchinbu hian Deity Yoga hi a chhutpui leh a hmasawnna tihna a ni a, a zinga deities te thil thlak ngaih a nih avangin energy channel te hman tawk an ni, chakra te a zirhri a, a chakran hriatna chu an siam a ni.

[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

src_text: Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport.

hyp_text: Tuna Timbuktu hi a pumkhatna tura hriat dan chhanin a hmunpui a ni lo va, a hmunpui zawk hi a hriat dan chhan a ni thin a, mahse a thil hriat dan chhan hi a inen a ni.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

hyp_text: Antiques tih hming hian an chhutah a, an chhiar a nih chuan an hriatpui tawh lo. Chhungkawin, goods 100 zet a nihna tura tax agency te chuan antiques tih hming a hlauh a ni.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

[Mizo]: Heti chung hian French tawng hmang Belgian leh Swiss ho hian sikulah French tawng pangai hi an zir deuh vek avangin French tawng pangai kan hmanga number kan sawi a nih pawhin an hrethiam tlangpui a ni.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Mizo]: Kum zabi tam tak kal ta atang tawh khan he hmuna cheng mipuite hian hmun rem lo tak takah uluk takin terrace an lo siam fur tawh a, tuipui bula tlang chhip chhengchhe ve tak tak thleng an lo siam tawh a ni.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Fairbank, Alaska chhim lama tui alh thei thlit fim loh barrel sang chuang zet mai a buak avangin Trans-Alaska Pipeline system mile 800 zeta thui chu khar hrih a ni.

[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Mizo]: Chhuah tan a nih atang khan The Onion hi fiamthua chanchinthar ngaihvenna hmunpui a ni hawt mai a. A chhuta tihchhuah te, October thla-ah ringawt pawh mi hrang 5000000 zet tlawhtu nei website te, fakna te, nileng zankhuaa chanchinthar puanna te, titi ngaihthlakna te leh tun hnaia an tihchhuah thar khawvel pum huap Our Dumb World te an nei a ni.
